title: Care Plan CRUD Controller
description:
Implement Care Plan Management Controller with Goal Tracking and Intervention Monitoring

Build a comprehensive controller to manage patient care plans, including the ability to define goals, track progress, and monitor interventions.

Requirements:
- Create RESTful API endpoints for care plan CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
- Implement goal management functionality within care plans:
  * Add/remove/update individual goals
  * Set measurable targets and timelines for each goal
  * Track goal status (not started, in progress, achieved, discontinued)
  * Record progress notes and milestone updates
- Implement intervention monitoring capabilities:
  * Associate interventions with specific goals
  * Track intervention frequency and adherence
  * Record outcomes and effectiveness metrics
  * Support multiple intervention types (medication, therapy, lifestyle, etc.)
- Add proper authorization checks to ensure users can only access/modify appropriate care plans
- Implement data validation for all inputs (goal metrics, dates, status transitions)
- Support filtering and querying care plans by patient, status, date range, or assigned provider
- Include pagination for list endpoints
- Add comprehensive error handling with meaningful error messages
- Write unit tests for business logic and integration tests for API endpoints
- Document API endpoints with request/response examples

Edge cases to consider:
- Handling care plan transitions when goals are modified or removed
- Managing historical data when interventions are updated
- Preventing deletion of care plans with active interventions
- Handling concurrent updates to the same care plan
- Supporting care plan templates for common conditions
